criticalSuccess.pattern: In a moment of perfect clarity, ${attackerName} ${verb} ${targetName}'s ${location}! ${opening} ${effect}! ${weaponType} finds its mark with brutal precision!
${targetName}'s ${location} shatters under the impact! ${opening} ${attackerName}'s ${weaponType} ${verb} with unstoppable force! ${effect}!
Time seems to slow as ${opening} ${attackerName}'s ${weaponType} ${verb} ${targetName}'s ${location} with perfect accuracy! ${effect}!
${opening} ${effect}! ${attackerName} delivers the perfect strike, ${verb} ${targetName}'s ${location} with ${weaponType} in a devastating blow!
${attackerName} seizes the perfect opening! ${opening} ${weaponType} ${verb} ${targetName}'s ${location} with lethal precision! ${effect}!
${effect}! ${targetName}'s ${location} suffers the full force of ${attackerName}'s attack! ${opening} ${weaponType} ${verb} with devastating effect!
${opening} Through perfect form and timing, ${attackerName}'s ${weaponType} ${verb} ${targetName}'s ${location}! ${effect}! Devastating!
${targetName} cannot avoid ${attackerName}'s strike! ${opening} ${weaponType} ${verb} ${location} with unstoppable momentum! ${effect}!
Critical strike! ${attackerName}'s ${weaponType} finds ${targetName}'s ${location}! ${opening} ${verb} with maximum force! ${effect}!
${effect}! The perfect moment arrives as ${opening} ${attackerName} ${verb} ${targetName}'s ${location} with ${weaponType} in a spectacular display!

success.pattern: ${targetName}'s ${location} takes the full impact of the strike as ${opening} ${attackerName} ${verb} with ${weaponType}. ${effect}

failure.pattern: ${targetName} evades as ${opening} ${attackerName}'s ${weaponType} finds only empty air where ${targetName}'s ${location} had been.
Targeting ${targetName}'s ${location}, ${attackerName}'s attack goes wide. ${opening} The strike misses its mark.
${attackerName}'s ${weaponType} fails to connect with ${targetName}. ${opening} The moment passes.
${opening} ${targetName} shifts at the last second! ${attackerName}'s ${weaponType} sweeps past ${location} without contact.
Close but not close enough! ${opening} ${attackerName}'s attack misses ${targetName}'s ${location}.
${attackerName} misjudges the distance. ${opening} ${weaponType} fails to reach ${targetName}'s ${location}.
${targetName} anticipates the strike! ${opening} ${attackerName}'s ${weaponType} meets only air.
${opening} ${attackerName} strikes where ${targetName} was, not where they are. The attack misses.
No contact! ${opening} ${attackerName}'s ${weaponType} swings through empty space as ${targetName} avoids ${location}.
${attackerName} extends too far! ${opening} ${weaponType} misses ${targetName} as balance falters.
${opening} Poor positioning costs ${attackerName} the strike. ${weaponType} fails to connect with ${targetName}'s ${location}.

criticalFailure.pattern: ${opening} but ${attackerName}'s attack against ${targetName} goes disastrously astray!
${opening} ${attackerName}'s ${weaponType} misses ${targetName} by an embarrassingly wide margin!
${targetName} barely has to move as ${opening} ${attackerName}'s ${weaponType} swings through empty space!
${opening} ${attackerName} loses focus, and ${weaponType} doesn't even come close to ${targetName}!
The tides of battle turn against ${attackerName} as ${opening} the attack fails miserably!
Complete miss! ${opening} ${attackerName}'s ${weaponType} swings wildly, missing ${targetName} by a mile!
${opening} ${attackerName} stumbles! ${weaponType} misses ${targetName} entirely as form collapses!
Catastrophic failure! ${opening} ${attackerName}'s attack against ${targetName} couldn't be worse!
${targetName} effortlessly avoids the clumsy strike! ${opening} ${attackerName}'s ${weaponType} finds nothing but air!
${opening} Total breakdown! ${attackerName}'s ${weaponType} swings uselessly as ${targetName} remains untouched!
${attackerName} completely misjudges! ${opening} ${weaponType} misses ${targetName} by an absurd distance!
Epic fail! ${opening} ${attackerName}'s strike is so far off that ${targetName} doesn't even flinch!
${opening} ${attackerName} loses all control! ${weaponType} spins harmlessly past ${targetName}!
